msbt.message: Heyyyyy Can I bend your ear for a few, ?
! Follow me and don't ask any questions
Hey, let's do a trust walk! That's where you follow me and don't ask any questions, .
HAPPY BIRTHDAY!
It is your birthday, right? We all wanted to surprise you!C'mon! Step up to the cake and press  to blow out the candles.
It is your birthday, right? We all wanted to surprise you!I know it's not a leap year, so we cheated the date just a bit. So sue us! Anyway, step up to the cake and press  to blow out the candles.
It is your ACTUAL birthday, right? For the first time in, like, four years? Well, it called for a celebration! So, c'mon! Step up to the cake and press  to blow out the candles.
Whoa, where are you going? You can't leave these burning! It's a fire code violation!
UhhYou're gonna blow out the candles, right? The cake is gonna get all waxy if you don't!
Aren't you forgetting something? Like, your whole entire party? Including blowing out the candles?!
Bravissimo! Happiest of birthdays to you, !
Now, what are we waiting for?<10_4 /> It's time for presents!
Andvoilà.
We all picked this out together, with a ton of input from yours truly. I hope you like it! And that's not all Can you give me just a moment?
Oh! You don't have any room to take this with you right now.No problem. We'll just send it to your place. And we have something else in store
It's a piñata! We all made it for your smashing enjoyment.
Oh, and there's another gift inside, of course. So take this and then give it a good whack!
Anytime you're ready
Alright, saunter over to that piñata if you will
Now, I'm gonna scream out "go!" That's your cue to tap  and start swinging that bat as fast as you can. Ready?<10_4 /> GO!
Nicely done! You really knew how to use that bat Are you some kind of professional? Ah, never mind that—let's get right to your prize. Birthday cupcakes!

Fabuloso! Well done!Remind me to call you when I need a professional athlete of some sort to attend one of my fashion shows. Oh, but I've lost the plot. This is all about your prize— some birthday cupcakes!
Bravissimo! Fantastico! Stupendo!I'm mixing and matching languages and making up words to express how good that was! Oh, but I'm forgetting the most important part—your gift. Birthday cupcakes!
Here you go, . I hope you enjoy these delicious birthday cupcakes!
Now, if you think you might have some leftovers I'm sure other folks would love to indulge as well!
Oh, of course. You didn't have any room before, so why would you have any now? I'll send it to you.
Aw, you ran out of space. No worries—I'll just send this straight to your mailbox.

And that's everything! No more surprises, I promise.I hope you're having a great day, and that you'll refer me for your next corporate event or promotion. Ha HA! I'm mostly kidding. Go out and have fun with the rest of the day, !
Aw, is it that time already?I'm gonna start counting down the minutes to next year's birthday right now. Ha HA!
Don't you know? You never leave a piñata hanging, !
You're not gonna leave without destroying the piñata, are you?We worked really hard making it so that you could smash it to smithereens!
The party's not over until someone annihilates that piñata! <10_4 />I don't make the rules.
Personally I like to press  to blow out the candles. But you do you, !
Remember, whenever you're ready, just step up to the cake and press  to blow out the candles.
Go on—fire this party up by putting out that fire! You know, press  to blow the candles out
Exclusive events are cool, but it's nice to do something where everyone's invited too. That's it.<10_4 /> I'm expanding the guest list for my birthday to the top 1,000 residents!
Here's to a whole year of happiness and on-trend personal growth!
You know, everyone can really see the work you put in this year. You're, like, on fire. I'm proud of you, !
You should have seen the look on your face when that piñata exploded!<10_4 /> The piñata's face was priceless too!
Whoa! It's a good thing I didn't fill that piñata with like I was originally planning!
